entry.title: 第三部分测试代码检测
entry.content:
sssss

ssss

{\% codeblock javatc lang:java /github/ git \%} import java.awt.; import javax.swing.;

@SuppressWarnings(“serial”) public class MainClass extends JFrame { ControlSnake control;

Toolkit kit;

Dimension dimen;

public static void main(String[] args) { new MainClass(“my snake”); }

public MainClass(String s) { super(s); control = new ControlSnake(); control.setFocusable(true); kit = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit(); dimen = kit.getScreenSize();

add(control); setLayout(new BorderLayout()); setLocation(dimen.width / 3, dimen.height / 3);// dimen.width/3,dimen.height/3 setSize(FWIDTH, FHEIGHT); setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE); setResizable(false); setVisible(true); }

public static final int FWIDTH = 315;

public static final int FHEIGHT = 380; }

{\% endcodeblock \%}

´´´ import java.awt.; import javax.swing.;

@SuppressWarnings(“serial”) public class MainClass extends JFrame { ControlSnake control;

Toolkit kit;

Dimension dimen;

public static void main(String[] args) { new MainClass(“my snake”); }

public MainClass(String s) { super(s); control = new ControlSnake(); control.setFocusable(true); kit = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit(); dimen = kit.getScreenSize();

add(control); setLayout(new BorderLayout()); setLocation(dimen.width / 3, dimen.height / 3);// dimen.width/3,dimen.height/3 setSize(FWIDTH, FHEIGHT); setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE); setResizable(false); setVisible(true); }

public static final int FWIDTH = 315;

public static final int FHEIGHT = 380; } ´´´
